org.ambraproject.wombat.service.remote

Interface SearchService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SolrSearchService

    public interface SearchService
    Interface to the article search service for the application.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SearchService.SearchCriterion
      Type representing some restriction on the desired search results--for instance, a date range, or a sort order.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<?,?> authorSearch(String author, Site site, int start, int rows, SearchService.SearchCriterion sortOrder, SearchService.SearchCriterion dateRange)
      Performs a search for an author's name.
      Map<?,?> getHomePageArticles(Site site, int start, int rows, SearchService.SearchCriterion sortOrder)
      Retrieves articles for display on a journal home page, where there is no actual query.
      Map<?,?> simpleSearch(String query, Site site, int start, int rows, SearchService.SearchCriterion sortOrder, SearchService.SearchCriterion dateRange)
      Performs a "simple" search (against all article fields) and returns the results.
      Map<?,?> subjectSearch(String subject, Site site, int start, int rows, SearchService.SearchCriterion sortOrder, SearchService.SearchCriterion dateRange)
      Performs a search by the subject fields.

    • Method Detail

      • simpleSearch

        Map<?,?> simpleSearch(String query,
                    Site site,
                    int start,
                    int rows,
                    SearchService.SearchCriterion sortOrder,
                    SearchService.SearchCriterion dateRange)
                      throws IOException
        Performs a "simple" search (against all article fields) and returns the results.
        Parameters:
        query - term we are searching for. If this is null, all articles will be returned (modulo sortOrder, start, rows, and dateRange).
        site - name of the site in which to search.
        start - starting result, zero-based. 0 will start at the first result.
        rows - max number of results to return
        sortOrder - specifies the desired ordering for results
        dateRange - specifies the date range for the results
        Returns:
        deserialized JSON returned by the search server
        Throws:
        IOException

      • subjectSearch

        Map<?,?> subjectSearch(String subject,
                     Site site,
                     int start,
                     int rows,
                     SearchService.SearchCriterion sortOrder,
                     SearchService.SearchCriterion dateRange)
                       throws IOException
        Performs a search by the subject fields.
        Parameters:
        subject - taxonomy term the search will be restricted to
        site - name of the site in which to search.
        start - starting result, zero-based. 0 will start at the first result.
        rows - max number of results to return
        sortOrder - specifies the desired ordering for results
        dateRange - specifies the date range for the results
        Returns:
        deserialized JSON returned by the search server
        Throws:
        IOException

      • authorSearch

        Map<?,?> authorSearch(String author,
                    Site site,
                    int start,
                    int rows,
                    SearchService.SearchCriterion sortOrder,
                    SearchService.SearchCriterion dateRange)
                      throws IOException
        Performs a search for an author's name.
        Parameters:
        author - full or partial author name
        site - name of the site in which to search.
        start - starting result, zero-based. 0 will start at the first result.
        rows - max number of results to return
        sortOrder - specifies the desired ordering for results
        dateRange - specifies the date range for the results
        Returns:
        deserialized JSON returned by the search server
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getHomePageArticles

        Map<?,?> getHomePageArticles(Site site,
                           int start,
                           int rows,
                           SearchService.SearchCriterion sortOrder)
                             throws IOException
        Retrieves articles for display on a journal home page, where there is no actual query.
        Parameters:
        site - name of the site in which to search
        start - starting result, zero-based. 0 will start at the first result.
        rows - max number of results to return
        sortOrder - specifies the desired ordering for results
        Returns:
        deserialized JSON returned by the search server
        Throws:
        IOException
